summary: At a high mountain hotel in Norway the porter Poppe tries to do the best he can for the guests with an often unhelpful piccolo Rudolf. This, however, leads to a lot of problems, and Poppe thinks some of the guests behave inappropriate.
cast: Leif Juster|Unni Bernhoft|Frank Robert|Anne Lise Christiansen|Nanna Stenersen|Anne Lise Wang|Einar Sissener|Willie Hoel|Brita Bigum|Edith Carlmar|Otto Carlmar|Liv Ullmann
title: Fjols til fjells
